channel.title: Imperium - ClanWARS
channel.description:
Welcome to my new development, I call it Imperium ClanWARS.
Basically, PvP servers aren't quite what they once were. Basically, I've added 508 Maps too my server along with 634 Items. This said i know they do have flaws, This is why i am only using a TINY percent of the map, Literally, 1 dungeon. The real clan wars map and like 2 or 3 other areas.
The Progress is slow seeing as i do have other commitments in my life. Unlike all of my other developments i do plan on finishing this one, This is why i am not setting a huge target, Just a small basic one.
Just a few pictures.
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/WFghFA.png[/img]
Changelog -Add 508 Maps (Friday 27th April 2012) -Cache Pack 634 Items (Saturday 28th April 2012) -Add Summoning Orb (Tuesday 1st May 2012)
[b]Todays Targets[/b] -Remove Wilderness Levels -Make Home

item.title: Imperium - ClanWARS
item.dc:creator: @DreaDs DreaDs
item.description:
@DreaDs wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:9, topic:441099”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=543775.msg3986041#msg3986041 date=1335904043]
OP good luck with the development, maybe you could show us some more progress and information.
[/quote]

Only really started this seriously today, Not really much to show, Will be updated when i have more to update. Been busy today so havent really gotten alot done, Gonna work on it alot tomorrow. But i have like 3 things in my life that are more important than this.

  1. My Fiancee
  2. My Family
  3. My Job.[/quote]

It should be

  1. My Family
  2. My Job
  3. Everything Else that matters
    Last. My Fiance (Bitches love assholes)
    Lastly. Shitting
    Forever Last / Infinity - Reading this exact reply on this thread

I once had a cock. Lost him after I came back from Iraq. My parents ate him. God dam I loved my cock. Just wasting your time. Of course, we lived on a farm so my pet cock was bound to get eaten.

Tl;dr
Bump.

Read full topic
